name: Pipe Golf
description:
Left Right Up Down to move

Press X to pause or resume the ball's movement.

Ctrl+R to restart

Stand on the laser buttons to fire lasers in the direction you're looking. The lasers will bend with the orange pipes, but will rotate the blue ones. 

Get the golf ball to the flag by taking advantage of these mechanics. If you fail in one run, you must restart.

Have fun, and happy holidays.

This game is dedicated a friend of mine who was taken too soon. I think about him and his family sometimes during the holidays and in the Secret Santa note I was given, they told me they liked golf. So did he. He would have loved this game, so I dedicated it to him.
